experiences.description: I organize and lead hands-on workshops about software development skills and technologies. I am also designing, directing, and implementing a full-stack project for tracking training materials to members of our club
I tutor my Computer Science peers weekly, helping them understand concepts and assignments from a variety of CS classes.

I worked on the Networking Tribe to develop a Private DNS product for IBM Cloud. Private DNS is a networking service that only allows specific whitelisted IP addresses to access certain DNS records/domains.
I worked on a bunch of projects at Modulis: fullstack features on internal CRM website, machine learning models for predicting call duration, and an open-source FTP-HTTP Proxy server in Golang.
I designed, directed, and executed a biomedical research project to bioengineer an antibody-based technology for immuno-oncology therapy. We then earned Bronze medal at an international competition!
